title: Unpicking the Primož Roglič Puzzle: ‘It Looks Like He Wants to Win Everything, to Ride for Himself, but He Really Cares’
content:
What's Rogla really like? Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe teammates give a behind-the-scenes view of the five-time grand tour winner.

Read the full article at Unpicking the Primož Roglič Puzzle: ‘It Looks Like He Wants to Win Everything, to Ride for Himself, but He Really Cares’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
